name: All Because Of This Goat !
description:
Description : 

All of Because Of This Goat ! is a game made in 8h with a Team of 6 people

The theme was to create a hero with a character editor 

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Lead Game Programmer

- Adam Aubart, Chara Designer

- Matéo Henneron, Background Designer

- Nael Goulam Rasoul, Game Designer

- Luc Gontier, Game Designer

- Ludovic Charlet, Game Designer

Thanks to our professor Esteves Aurélien to organize this jam

You can play with your mouse
